snippet.title: Spider Queen cave | Early Access | GamePlay PC
snippet.description:
This is a very challenging adventure micro terror game. The game focuses on operation and decryption. The exquisite level design in the game will make you want to die and want to live.

Story Background
The senior I have been in love with for a long time has been missing for three months. I searched everywhere, but I couldn't find any information. She seemed to have evaporated from the world. Tonight, my senior sister suddenly made a video call. In the picture, my senior sister's face was pale, and she asked me to go to an abandoned villa in the suburbs, and told me to come alone. I had no choice but to prepare to leave. It is said that the villa is a famous haunted house. I, who was full of thoughts about ending my 20 years of being single, rushed to my senior sister's house, but she kept soaking in the bathtub and refused to come out. Thinking of how many opportunities I missed because of my cowardice in the past, I plucked up the courage to push open the door of the bathroom. Unexpectedly, the next scene was unforgettable for me...I thought that everything was over after escaping from this damned house, but in order to save my senior, I jumped into that well. Unexpectedly, there is a huge underground world inside, a mysterious underwater, and a gloomy underground palace , There were screams from the depths of the maze. The bones along the way tell me that I am not the first person to come here.

Exquisite and huge scene
Different from the small space of traditional horror games, we have created a huge world in the game. In addition to apartments and villas in daily life. We have also prepared an exquisite underwater world, a maze of tombs, and exquisitely designed traps.

Appropriate horror elements
You don't need to be nervous and scared all the time to play this game, after scaring you, we have prepared a relaxing time, guaranteed you will enjoy it a lot. If you are really afraid of playing horror games, we have also prepared some props that do not affect the game content but can give you courage. You can take the initiative to choose to bring him, so that you can play the game happily.

Challenging levels
All kinds of exquisite designs, even an immovable terrain requires observation and thinking. Imagine how every action might take away your tension! After completing the level, you can also challenge for a one-time success from beginning to end!
